messages.msgSnippet: We also play toontown. !!! Alex ... From: Heather To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com Sent: Saturday, January 27, 2007 11:05 AM Subject: Re:
messages.messageBody:
We also play toontown. !!!
Alex



----- Original Message -----
From: Heather
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, January 27, 2007 11:05 AM
Subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Don't Bother Me Mom - I'm Learning


Yes, I loved it!

The author talks about how our kids are "digital natives" while us parents
are "digital immigrants" and that we need to learn to speak their language
<g>.

One of the online games the author suggests is toontown.com so the kids & I
are playing it a lot :)

heather
...mom to quentin, 11, and sierra, 8
...tucson

p.s. if you want to try toontown, let me know and I can send you a link for
a free 7 day trial. You can go to toontown.com yourself and get a 3 day
trial. If you use my link, I get jellybeans, the currency of toontown.

On 1/27/07, Johanna <dialog@...> wrote:
>
> Dear List,
>
> hast anyone read this?

> Preparing Your Kids For 21st Century Success--and How You Can Help!
> by Marc Prensky
>
> Can you recommend it?
>
